documentation.text:
@title Represents a bridged Centrifuge asset.
@author ChainSafe Systems.

params.asset: Hash of asset deposited on Centrifuge chain.

store(bytes32).notice: Marks {asset} as stored.{asset} must not have already been stored.Emits {AssetStored} event.
